snippet: The Senate has confirmed a specialist on human fatigue to fill a longstanding vacancy at nation’s top automotive safety agency.
abstract: Senate confirms Mark R Rosekind as National Highway Traffic Safety Administration chief administrator one year after resignation of David L Strickland; Rosekind is a specialist on human fatigue.
lead_paragraph: The Senate has confirmed a specialist on human fatigue to fill a longstanding vacancy at nation’s top automotive safety agency.

headline.main: Senate Confirms Nominee to Head Auto Safety Agency
headline.print_headline: Senate Confirms Nominee to Head Auto Safety Agency
